section.heading: Proposals to develop a Technical Training Program.

para.text: The Mayor shall issue a RFP inviting organizations to submit proposals for the development and implementation of a Technical Training Program consistent with this chapter and rules promulgated pursuant to this chapter.
The Technical Training Program shall contain, at minimum, the following training elements:
Teaching individuals the legal rights and responsibilities of homeownership;
Training individuals in financial management to assist them in meeting the financial responsibilities of homeownership;
Providing individuals with technical skills that will permit them to identify and correct conditions that are unsafe or that may otherwise lead to deterioration of the property; and
Providing individuals with such other skills and information as may be required by rule.

annotations.annotation: This section is referenced in § 42-2104 and § 42-2108.
D.C. Law 14-114, in subsec. (a), substituted “Mayor” for “Administrator”; and, in subsec. (b)(1), deleted “of cooperative and other forms” before “of homeownership”.
